original_text: After we turned away from you, we were sorry that we had done that. We understood what we had done, and we showed that we were sad. We were ashamed and upset, because of the disgusting things that we did when we were young.” After we turned away from you, we were sorry that we had done that. korean_text: 내가 돌이킨 후에 뉘우쳤고 내가 교훈을 받은 후에 내 볼기를 쳤사오니 이는 어렸을 때의 치욕을 지므로 부끄럽고 욕됨이니이다 하도다

sentences.original_text: After we turned away from you,
we were sorry that we had done that.
We understood what we had done,
and we showed that we were sad.
that we did when we were young.
